title: @Riot PLEASE LET ME SPEND IP
body:
It has gotten to the point for the last few month all i do with IP is regularly name change.
I have 20 rune pages and every champion.
here are some ideas for what you could release:
Specially champion emotes
Banners for profile 
! ! ! Ability to host a feature game mode such as U.R.F or All Fore One custom games ! ! !


P.S i have an idea for a featured game mode *LATE GAME* you start a game on summoners rift level 18, 5th dragon buff, 99999 gold

replies.body: here's a sick idea, go outside an achieve something in the real world
dont see why your so salty ive been playing for 5 years and only have 61 days in according to some sight i was linked
Wish i could play league like i play sport, I'd be plat at least i reckon... sigh..
